mapper.select: SELECT table_name AS "tableName" , table_comment AS "description" FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = #{schemaName};

SELECT cols.table_name AS "tableName" , cols.column_name AS "columnName" , cols.data_type AS "type" , COALESCE(cols.character_maximum_length, cols.numeric_precision) AS "size" , CASE cols.is_nullable WHEN 'YES' THEN 'T' ELSE 'F' END AS "isNullable" , cols.column_comment AS "description" FROM information_schema.columns cols JOIN information_schema.tables tbls ON cols.table_schema = tbls.table_schema AND cols.table_name = tbls.table_name WHERE cols.table_schema = #{schemaName} AND cols.table_name = #{tableName} ORDER BY cols.table_name, cols.ordinal_position

SELECT c.table_name AS "tableName" , c.column_name AS "columnName" , CASE WHEN tc.constraint_type = 'PRIMARY KEY' THEN 'p' WHEN tc.constraint_type = 'FOREIGN KEY' THEN 'f' WHEN tc.constraint_type = 'UNIQUE' THEN 'u' ELSE NULL END AS "keyType" , kcu.referenced_table_name AS "refTableName" , kcu.referenced_column_name AS "refColumnName" FROM information_schema.columns c LEFT JOIN information_schema.key_column_usage kcu ON c.table_schema = kcu.table_schema AND c.table_name = kcu.table_name AND c.column_name = kcu.column_name JOIN information_schema.table_constraints tc ON kcu.constraint_name = tc.constraint_name AND kcu.table_name = tc.table_name AND kcu.table_schema = tc.table_schema WHERE c.table_schema = #{schemaName} AND c.table_name = #{tableName} ORDER BY c.table_name, c.ordinal_position
SELECT '' AS "sequenceName" , 0 AS "startValue" , 0 AS "maxValue" , 0 AS "increment" , 'F' AS "isCycle" where 1=0;
SELECT table_name , view_definition FROM information_schema.views WHERE table_schema = #{schemaName}
